name: UI Facelift PRD
description: A comprehensive UI facelift for Ralph TUI to improve visual appeal, user experience, and modernize the interface. This PRD includes tasks for each major page/tab of the application.

userStories.title: Header Component Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the header to have a modern, clean design - So that I can quickly identify the application and its status
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign the header with improved spacing and visual hierarchy
Add better status indicators with clearer colors
Optimize for both light and dark themes
Ensure header content is properly truncated on narrow terminals

userStories.title: Footer Component Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the footer to display relevant information clearly - So that I can access important controls and status at a glance
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign the footer with improved layout and readability
Add more intuitive keyboard shortcut indicators
Include relevant system information (e.g., version, mode)
Ensure consistent styling with the rest of the UI

userStories.title: Tasks View Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the tasks view to be visually appealing and easy to navigate - So that I can quickly identify task status and priority
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign task cards with improved visual hierarchy
Add better status indicators and colors
Optimize for different terminal sizes
Improve readability of task descriptions and metadata

userStories.title: Iteration History View Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the iteration history view to be clear and informative - So that I can review past iterations and their outcomes
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign iteration cards with improved visual design
Add better status indicators and colors
Optimize for readability of iteration details
Improve spacing and layout for better visual appeal

userStories.title: Activity View Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the activity view to be visually engaging and informative - So that I can track real-time activity and system events
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign the activity timeline with improved visual design
Add better event indicators and colors
Optimize for readability of event details
Improve spacing and layout for better visual appeal

userStories.title: Logs View Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the logs view to be clear and easy to read - So that I can review detailed execution logs and troubleshoot issues
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign log panes with improved visual design
Add better syntax highlighting and readability
Optimize for different terminal sizes
Improve spacing and layout for better visual appeal

userStories.title: Settings View Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the settings view to be well-organized and easy to use - So that I can configure the application to my needs
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign the settings view with improved visual design
Add better organization and grouping of settings
Optimize for readability and user experience
Improve spacing and layout for better visual appeal

userStories.title: Progress Dashboard Facelift
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the progress dashboard to be visually appealing and informative - So that I can quickly assess the current state of the application
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign the dashboard with improved visual hierarchy
Add better status indicators and colors
Optimize for readability of key metrics
Improve spacing and layout for better visual appeal

userStories.title: Theme and Color Palette Enhancement
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the application to have a consistent, modern color palette - So that the interface is visually appealing and easy to use
acceptanceCriteria: Enhance the color palette with modern, harmonious colors
Ensure consistency across all components and views
Optimize for both light and dark themes
Improve contrast and readability

userStories.title: Responsive Design Optimization
userStories.description: - As a user, I want the application to look good on different terminal sizes - So that I can use it effectively on various devices and screen dimensions
acceptanceCriteria: Optimize all views for different terminal sizes
Ensure content is properly truncated and wrapped
Improve spacing and layout for small terminals
Test and adjust for various screen dimensions
